articles.title: What Gemini features you get with Google AI Plus, Pro, & Ultra [February 2026] - 9to5Google
articles.description: At I/O 2025, Google One AI Premium (and Gemini Advanced) became Google AI Pro, while a more expensive tier was introduced with AI Ultra.
articles.content:
At I/O 2025, Google One AI Premium (and Gemini Advanced) became “Google AI Pro,” while a higher, more expensive tier was introduced with “Google AI Ultra.”
